From: KSLawdogg@...

Ramhorn/Manterror/Stinkbomb/Injector/Breakdown/Hiss/Pyro:

::Injector saw Manterror slowly get up, though he was badly hurt with his 
head injuries::
"Manterror, how are you?"

"I...I.....ok....need....'pairs.....ill....'mal." (Manterror ran forward, 
kicking upwards at Teltoli's chin)

"Yeah, we kill these two Maxis then we retreat, if those reinforcements are 
coming they won't arrive soon enough." (Injector aimed the laser pistol in 
his hand at Ramhorn's face)

"N...Not so fas...fast Pred!" (Stinkbomb yelled, running forward and slamming 
his left elbow into Injector's back, the fuzor hitting the ground).
::Injector was leaking mech-fluid all over his body, and his right arm was 
'dislocated', hanging loosely::

::Manterror turned firing an ion disk, but Stinkbomb hopped to the left, then 
dived forward, taking Manterror out by his legs::
"Take...this!" Stinkbomb slammed Manterror's head into the dirt eight times 
until the surrounding dirt in a ten foot radius was mixed in with a light 
bluish mech-fluid.

::A kick from Injector sent Stinkbomb to the ground, in Injector's left hand 
was a big wrench, in the other his stinger missile launcher::
"Open up wide!" ::Injector stomped his right foot down on Stinkbomb's 
stomach, Stinkbomb's mouth popping open, then a blow from the wrench keeping 
them stuck open::
"Say goodbye, but be glad, you're going to be killed by the best Predacon out 
of the bunch!"
::Injector took precise aim at the middle of Stinkbomb's mouth at an angle so 
the stinger missile would hit the back of his throat and cause deadly damage, 
the fuzor wrapping his trigger finger around the trigger of death::
